name: Pramoedya Ananta Toer
description: Indonesian author and human rights activist, considered one of the greatest writers of the 20th century, known for his Buru Quartet novels
philosophy: All that is written is not meant to be read by all. But all that is lived is meant to be shared by all.
quotes: The more often a person tells a lie, the more it becomes a personal truth to him
People must be taught to hate, and if they can be taught to hate, they can also be taught to love
